short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate paint requirements based on surface area, spreading rate, and number of coats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Paint Calculator Chrome extension helps users quickly calculate the amount of paint required for a project. Simply input the height, length, spreading rate, and number of coats to get an accurate estimate of how much paint you'll need.
